containerfilter-inspector-input-selector: Label for input widget which allows to set selectors which content section should be search
containerfiler-droplet-name: Text for droplet name for tag containerfilter
containerfiler-droplet-description: Description for droplet of tag containerfilter
containerfilter-input-aria-label: Aria label for input field to filter container
containerfilter-filter-results-label:
Label for results found from filtering
Parameters:
* $1 - number of results
